name: Sweet Sacrifice
description:
The evil lord ordered a crew of murderous pumpkins to sacrifice some sweets for his sacred ritual.  Trick or treat? In this game you must choose to kill or run.

Note: the treat game is not finished, so u may find some bugs.

Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Shoot: Left mouse button

Aim: Mouse
